thread.title: I Can’t Stop Laughing At This Windmill Causing Absolutely Pandemonium In ‘GTA V’
thread.title_full: I Can’t Stop Laughing At This Windmill Causing Absolutely Pandemonium In ‘GTA V’

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: I Can’t Stop Laughing At This Windmill Causing Absolutely Pandemonium In ‘GTA V’
text:
高速道路に風車を一本生やすだけでずっと見ていられる pic.twitter.com/OoNkH32bxD 
— ガタオ (@YEStakoprey) February 22, 2017 

Love how something so simple can inflict so much chaos. All this dude did was plop down a power windmill in the middle of a free way in San Andreas. It ends up causing a wild string of destruction thanks to GTA V being GTA V. 
So hypnotizing.
